property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, if you have a total of 3 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it on the bottom of their deck. Then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can attack your opponent on the turn you put it into the battle zone. ■ This creature attacks your opponent each turn if able. ■ While you have 2 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, this creature gets +3000 power and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
